long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Focus Lock - Boost Your Productivity and Block Distractions

Are you struggling to stay focused and productive while working or studying online? Say goodbye to distractions and hello to productivity with Focus Lock â€“ your ultimate productivity partner.

Key Features:

Customizable Time Tracking: Set your productivity goals and track your time spent on websites. Focus Lock helps you stay accountable by showing you exactly how much time you've spent working versus how much you still need to achieve your goals.

Block Distracting Sites: Add websites to your blacklist and block them during your work sessions. If you haven't reached your productivity goals, Focus Lock will redirect you to a blocking page instead of letting you visit these sites.

Whitelist Important Sites: Ensure that your important and essential sites remain accessible. Add sites to your whitelist to keep them accessible, even if they're on your blacklist.

Real-Time Updates: See real-time updates on your remaining time and productivity progress. Focus Lock provides you with clear and concise feedback on your progress, helping you stay motivated.

Easy-to-Use Interface: Our intuitive and user-friendly interface makes it easy to set up and manage your productivity goals, whitelist, and blacklist.

Service Worker for Continuous Tracking: Focus Lock uses a background service worker to keep track of your productivity even if you switch tabs or windows. Start and stop tracking seamlessly based on your active tab.

Why Choose Focus Lock?

Boost Productivity: Reduce the time wasted on distracting websites and increase your focus on what really matters.
Customizable Goals: Set and adjust your productivity goals according to your needs.
Simple and Effective: Focus Lock is designed to be straightforward yet powerful, making it easy to stay on track.
How It Works:

Set Your Timer: Define how much time you need to work and set it up in Focus Lock.
Manage Whitelist and Blacklist: Add or remove websites from your whitelist and blacklist.
Track Your Progress: Monitor your time spent and see your remaining time in real-time.
Stay on Task: If you try to visit a blacklisted site while time remains, you'll be redirected to a helpful blocking page.
Get Started Today!

Download Focus Lock and transform the way you work. Achieve your productivity goals with ease and stay focused on what matters most.
